remarks: Extract a summand/factor from the group sum for the multiplicative group of a unital ring.  (Contributed by AV, 29-Dec-2018.)
statement:
mgpsumunsn.m $e |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) $.
mgpsumunsn.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
mgpsumunsn.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
mgpsumunsn.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
mgpsumunsn.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. N ) $.
mgpsumunsn.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. N ) -> A e. ( Base ` R ) ) $.
mgpsumunsn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` R ) ) $.
mgpsumunsn.e $e |- ( k = I -> A = X ) $.
mgpsumunsn $p |- ( ph -> ( M gsum ( k e. N |-> A ) ) = ( ( M gsum ( k e. ( N \ { I } ) |-> A ) ) .x. X ) ) $.
$d I k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d R k $.
$d X k $.
$d k ph $.
